name: MangoAIChatGPT,Claude,Gemini-AmbientNoise
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mango a. i.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Mango AI, the ultimate Alexa app powered by advanced AI models like OpenAI's GPT-4o (mini too), Claude 3.5 Sonnet and Haiku, and Gemini 1.5 Pro and Flash. Whether you need quick answers, engaging trivia games, or a smart assistant, Mango AI is here to assist. Combining the power of artificial intelligence with voice commands, it's an indispensable tool for your everyday needs.

Models:
- GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, and Gemini 1.5 Pro are all available to paid users, with unlimited access.
- GPT-4o-mini, Claude 3 Haiku, and Gemini Flash are available to free users, up to 10 times per day. Paid users get unlimited access to these models too.
* Mini, Haiku and Flash respond quickly and efficiently, while the other models are slower and more accurate. You can switch models anytime to find which one you like the best.

Disclaimer: This app may occasionally provide incorrect answers; we cannot guarantee all information is accurate. We are not responsible for any incorrect information provided. Alexa also has limitations on interactions.

Key Features:

1. Answer Questions

 Ask Mango AI anything and receive quick, AI-generated responses. From general knowledge to specific inquiries, Mango AI leverages multiple models to provide answers to your questions.

2. Play Games

 Challenge yourself and friends with engaging trivia games. Say, "Alexa, ask Mango AI to play Lord of the Rings trivia" (or any topic), and dive into questions that test your knowledge. Trivia is played like Jeopardy, so answer the questions with a question. "Who is gandalf the grey?" or "What is the capital of Canada?"

 Or play a fun game of 20 questions with your friends. "Alexa, ask Mango AI to play 20 questions with me"

3. Memory Feature

 Mango AI tracks your past interactions for a personalized, context-aware experience. No need to repeat yourself; Mango AI remembers your previous conversations for seamless interactions.

4. Free and Paid Versions

 Mango AI offers free and paid versions:
 - Free Version: Limited access with up to 10 interactions per day. Use models like GPT-4o Mini, Claude 3 Haiku, and Gemini 1.5 Flash.
 - Paid Version: Unlocks unlimited access to all features and models, including GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet Latest, and Gemini 1.5 Pro. Paid users enjoy unlimited usage and access to all the models available in the app.

5. Ambient Noise Player

 Mango AI also offers an ambient noise player to help you relax. Ask Mango AI to play calming sounds like rain, ocean waves, or white noise. Just say:

 - "Alexa, ask Mango AI to play rain sounds"
 - "Alexa, ask Mango AI for white noise"

 Available sounds include Rain, Ocean Waves, Thunderstorm, Blue Noise, Brown Noise, Babbling Brook, Fireplace, Pink Noise, and ambient music. Mango AI can play ambient noise for up to 10 hours before looping (premium feature).

6. Easy Invocation

 Getting started with Mango AI is simple. Use phrases like:

 - "Alexa, open Mango AI"
 - "Alexa, ask Mango AI to play Minecraft trivia"
 - "Alexa, ask Mango AI who is Albert Einstein"

7. Seamless Integration

 Mango AI integrates effortlessly with Alexa, providing a smooth, user-friendly experience. With its distinctive icon, Mango AI is easily accessible.

Why Choose Mango AI?

Mango AI combines cutting-edge technology with voice command convenience, making it essential for your Alexa skills. Whether you want to expand your knowledge, entertain with trivia, relax with ambient sounds, or get quick answers, Mango AI delivers speed and intelligence. Paid users enjoy unlimited access and enhanced features, unlocking advanced AI models for a smarter, more responsive experience.

Experience the future of AI-assisted interactions with Mango AI. Upgrade today to access premium models and enjoy unlimited usage of all features.
